author: The Spiffing Brit
description:
The year is 2025 and here we are revisiting the biggest game release of 2020! Cyberpunk 2077 is back and is currently topping steam player chart records thanks to many incredible updates, new features and a glorious DLC alongside the fantastic anime cyberpunk edgerunners. So what better way to celebrate a game improving than by diving back into the release build of the game cyberpunk version 1.0 or in this case version 1.0.3 which is the earliest possible version that a human can get running. So my goal today is to see if I can make progress or if its even possible to eventually beat cyberpunk 2077 with this version of the game. There is only one way to find out and I The Spiffing Brit will make sure we discover many bugs, glitches and exploits along the way. Lets see what cd project red first released. 

What you have seen here today is part of a fantastic perfectly balanced gameplay series on youtube where I go from game to game and break them with wacky exploits to gain things like
title: I Played The Cyberpunk 2077 Release Build in 2025.
